purebasicFormsDesigner.showGrid.descript: Show a grid in the designer canvas.
purebasicFormsDesigner.snapToGrid.descri: Snap gadget positions to the grid while dragging.
purebasicFormsDesigner.windowFillOpacity: Window background fill opacity inside the designer.
Optional CSS color for the designer background. Empty = use theme editor background.
purebasicFormsDesigner.snapMode.descript: Snapping behavior: live while dragging, or only on mouse release.
purebasicFormsDesigner.outsideDimOpacity: Dim opacity for the area outside the form window.
purebasicFormsDesigner.titleBarHeight.de: Title bar height drawn at the top of the form window (0 disables).
purebasicFormsDesigner.expectedPbVersion: Optional: show a warning when the .pbf header PureBasic version differs from this value. Empty disables the check.
